Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:00.52]Don't let this be our final song
[00:08.21]Don't let this be our final song
[00:15.84]Don't let this be our final song
[00:17.35]Please, won't you wait? Won't you stay?
[00:19.95]At least until the sun goes down
[00:21.89]When you're gone, I lose faith
[00:23.68]I lose everything I have found
[00:25.52]Heart strings, violins
[00:27.26]That's what I hear when you're by my side
[00:30.89]Yeah, that's what I hear when you're by my side
[00:33.28]
[00:34.73]And when you're gone the music goes
[00:38.57]I lose my rhythm, lose my soul
[00:42.20]So hear me out before you say the night is over
[00:45.63]I want you to know that we gotta, gotta carry on
[00:49.81]So don't let this be our final song
[00:53.75]So don't let this be our final song
[00:57.59]So hear me out before you say the night is over
[01:01.27]I want you to know that we gotta, gotta carry on
[01:04.95]So don't let this be our final song
[01:12.92]So hear me out before you say the night is over
[01:16.50]I want you to know that we gotta, gotta carry on
[01:20.33]So don't let this be our final song
[01:22.49]
[01:22.84]Baby when we were young
[01:24.48]There was nothing to make believe
[01:26.62]And the songs that we sang
[01:28.12]They were written for you and me
[01:30.36]Melodies on repeat
[01:31.96]That's what I hear when you're by my side
[01:35.79]Yeah, that's what I hear when you're by my side
[01:39.97]And when you're gone the music goes
[01:42.81]I lose my rhythm, lose my soul
[01:46.79]So hear me out before you say the night is over
[01:50.32]I want you to know that we gotta, gotta carry on
[01:54.45]So don't let this be our final song
[01:56.35]
[01:58.49]So don't let this be our final song
[02:02.19]So hear me out before you say the night is over
[02:05.82]I want you to know that we gotta, gotta carry on
[02:09.70]So don't let this be our final song
[02:17.60]So hear me out before you say the night is over
[02:21.03]I want you to know that we gotta, gotta carry on
[02:25.11]So don't let this be our final song
[02:27.19]
[02:29.78]Woo-ooo, take us to a higher ground
[02:31.82]Here and now, whatever you do, just don't look down
[02:37.59]Woo-ooo, underneath the disco light, it's alright
[02:40.38]We could make the perfect sound
[02:44.27]And when you're gone the music goes
[02:48.05]I lose my rhythm, lose my soul
[02:51.53]So hear me out before you say the night is over
[02:55.17]I want you to know that we gotta, gotta carry on
